方.definition: square; power or involution (math.); upright; honest; fair and square; direction; side; party (to a contract, dispute etc); place; method; prescription (medicine); just when; only or just; classifier for square things; abbr. for square or cubic meter

方丈.definition: square zhang (i.e. unit of area 10 feet square); monastic room 10 feet square; Buddhist or Daoist abbot; abbot's chamber

方位.definition: direction; points of the compass; bearing; position; azimuth

方便.definition: convenient; suitable; to facilitate; to make things easy; having money to spare; (euphemism) to relieve oneself

方冊.definition: ancient books and volumes; classical writings

方命.definition: against orders; to disobey; to refuse to accept orders

方城.definition: square castle; mahjong layout (with the tiles laid out as a square)

方城縣.definition: Fangcheng county in Nanyang 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan

方塊.definition: cube; block; square; diamond ♦ (in card games)

方孔錢.definition: round coin with a square hole in the middle, used in former times in China

方家.definition: learned person; expert in a certain field; abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]

方寸.definition: square cun (Chinese unit of area: 1 cun × 1 cun, or 3⅓ cm × 3⅓ cm); heart; mind

方寸大亂.definition: (idiom) to become agitated; to get worked up

方尾鶲.definition: (bird species of China) grey-headed canary-flycatcher (Culicicapa ceylonensis)

方山.definition: Fangshan county in Lüliang 呂梁|吕梁[Lu:3 liang2], Shanxi 山西

方山縣.definition: Fangshan county in Lüliang 呂梁|吕梁[Lu:3 liang2], Shanxi 山西

方式.definition: way; manner; style; mode; pattern; CL:個|个[ge4]

方文山.definition: Vincent Fang (1969-), Taiwanese multi-Golden Melody Award lyricist

方枘圓鑿.definition: lit. like a square peg in a round hole (idiom); fig. incompatible

方格.definition: checked pattern; square box character (in Chinese text) indicating an illegible character

方格紙.definition: squared paper; graph paper; grid paper (manuscript paper with squares for Chinese characters)

方案.definition: plan; program (for action etc); proposal; proposed bill; CL:個|个[ge4],套[tao4]

方正縣.definition: Fangzheng county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang

方法論.definition: methodology; Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637

方滋未艾.definition: flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding; still growing strong; on the up

方物.definition: produced locally; local product (with distinctive native features)

方策.definition: strategy; policy; general plan; variant of 方冊|方册[fang1 ce4]

方興未已.definition: flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding; still growing strong; on the up

方興未艾.definition: flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding; still growing strong; on the up

方艙.definition: portable building; demountable building; transportable building; (UK) portacabin

方術.definition: arts of healing, divination, horoscope etc; supernatural arts (old)

方釳.definition: (arch.) metal horn attached as shield to horse or to the axle of a chariot

方面.definition: respect; aspect; field; side; CL:個|个[ge4]
